column5: South}}</ref>), born '''Vinyarion''', was the twenty-fourth [[King of Gondor]].

column1: Vinyarion's father [[Aldamir]] was slain in a war with the [[Haradrim]], and he ascended the throne. He led Gondor's armies against [[Harad]] to avenge the death of his father.<ref name="Elendil"/>  In {{TA
column2: 1551}} he won a great victory over the Haradrim<ref>{{App
column3: TA}}</ref> and took the name Hyarmendacil II to commemorate this achievement.<ref name="Elendil"/>
